customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
If someone of ill intent seeks to enter Aaru Village, the only thing that will greet them will be the pointed spears of the guards. The dutiful guard, Fodil, had faced plenty of powerful foes in his youth, and thus possessed a deep well of experience to draw from, with some of his new foes breathing clarity into old memories...
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule — Mastery Talisman: Extended Explosion — For every 3 times the opposing characters take Elemental Reaction DMG, you will deal 4 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Mirror Maiden
customize.desc:
"Snezhnayan Maiden" Mirror Enovy

All secrets shall be concealed within the mirror of glaring brightness…

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>
